A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This film is just aweful: plot\, subplots\, and script. I cringed at least 5 times. It should be stricken from canon. if you are a fan of the originals\, dodge this like the plague. Driver and Hamil are great. Its also a crime Billy Dee Williams isnt in here\, but they would just diminish him\, then kill him like Luke and Han. Howevet\, there was a golden opportunity for him to save the casino scene. There is not a terrible performance in the bunch\, but the cast was thrown down a sarlacc of SJW multiculturalism and poorly communicated plot chains. It will literally make you feel as if every man in the film is a weak pitiful loser that has to learn a lesson from a woman to have any worth. Rey and Finn become not victims of a sith lord\, but of a TERRIBLE story that tries to teach misguided Disney lessons.
